DOC.brief_summary: A prospective study led amongst pulmonologists. Patients asthma control level will be evaluated based on GINA guideline criteria. HRQoL measured by Visual analogue scale. Clinical practice: non controlled patients therapy assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Asthma Control and Clinical Practice in Hungary 2009
DOC.criteria: Asthma patients treated with ICS or bronchodilators COPD pulmonary cancer pulmonary tuberculosis
